title.en: Regularly Recitable Prayer to the Root Guru

text.en: You embody all sources of refuge, the three seats complete within your form,
text.en-trans: kyabné kündü den sum tsangwé ku

text.en: Your speech proclaims the Dharma that dispels the torment of the afflictions,
text.en-trans: nyönmong dung sel chö dra drokpé sung

text.en: And your mind possesses the five wisdoms and bliss, clarity and non-thought—
text.en-trans: yeshe ngaden dé sal mitok tuk

text.en: Sovereign preserver of secrets, Vajra Holder,
Loter Wangpo, at your feet I pray:
text.en-trans: loter wangpö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: With body, speech and mind, I offer everything to you.
text.en-trans: go sum ngöpo kün gyi chöpar gyi

text.en: Dispel all outer, inner and secret obstacles.
text.en-trans: chi nang sangwé barché kün sel zhing

text.en: I confess all faults and impairments and breakages of samaya.
Cause all my wishes to be spontaneously fulfilled.
text.en-trans: sampa tamché lhün gyi drubpa dang

text.en: Grant the supreme and common attainments, I pray.
text.en-trans: chok dang tünmong ngödrub tsal du sol

text.en: Inspire me to fulfil my own and others’ purpose.
text.en-trans: rangzhen dön nyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: Hold me in your compassion, never parting, until awakening.
